title: Tech Moves: Zillow VP joins OpenSea; Panopto hires Microsoft manager; product vet joins Binance - GeekWire
content: Tech Moves: Zillow VP joins OpenSea; Panopto hires Microsoft manager; product vet joins Binance  GeekWire
description: — Loni Manhanta, formerly vice president of government relations & public policy for Zillow Group, joined NFT marketplace OpenSea in a similar role. OpenSea uses blockchain technology to sell NFTs…
